PHRASE.LANG: Do you have what it takes to be the savior of the PlayStation®Home Universe? Take down the evil alien hordes in this frenzied shoot 'em up arcade game. (Comes with 10 FREE PlayStation®Home Rewards that are unlocked during gameplay)[#Legal]
Serez-vous à la hauteur pour sauver l'univers PlayStation®Home ? Éliminez des hordes d'extraterrestres enragés dans ce shoot'em up d'arcade délirant. [#Legal]
Haben Sie das Zeug, das PlayStation®Home-Universum zu retten? Erledigen Sie in diesem rasanten Arcade-Shooter die bösen Alien-Horden. [#Legal]
Hai la stoffa per salvare l'universo di PlayStation®Home? Sconfiggi le orde di alieni con questo folle sparatutto. [#Legal]
¿Tienes lo que hay que tener para convertirte en el salvador del universo PlayStation®Home? Acaba con las hordas alienígenas en este frenético juego de disparos. [#Legal]
爆裂縦スクロールシューティング！落書きエイリアン軍団をやっつけよう！[#Legal]
빠른 액션의 슈팅 게임에서 외계인들과 맞서십시오. [#Legal]

Do you have what it takes to be the savior of the PlayStation®Home Universe? Take down the evil alien hordes in this frenzied shoot 'em up arcade game. (Comes with 10 FREE PlayStation®Home Rewards that are unlocked during gameplay)[#Legal]
在這個瘋狂射擊遊戲裡擊倒外星人。 [#Legal]
